product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Jacket - Infant Boys'
long_description: The North Face Denali jacket for infant boys snuggles your little one in warm, water-repellent polyester fleece and handsome style. Exceptionally warm, recycled heavyweight Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant taffeta overlays on upper body and reinforced stitching in high-stress areas increase durability. The North Face Denali jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets, non-binding nylon/Lycra(R) spandex cuffs and an elastic-bound hem. Full-length front zipper extends high for neck protection; write-on ID label helps prevent loss.
short_description: The North Face Denali jacket for infant boys snuggles your little one in warm, water-repellent polyester fleece and handsome style.
